sourcesContent:
// API Configuration
export const API_URL = 'http://localhost:5000/api';

// Other configuration constants can be added here
export const APP_NAME = 'E-Commerce Admin Panel';
export const APP_VERSION = '1.0.0';

// Theme configuration
export const THEME_CONFIG = {
  light: {
    primary: '#2563EB', // Professional blue
    secondary: '#0EA5E9', // Sky blue
    accent: '#7C3AED', // Purple for highlights
    success: '#059669', // Green for success states
    warning: '#D97706', // Orange for warnings
    error: '#DC2626', // Red for errors
    background: '#F8FAFC', // Light gray background
    surface: '#FFFFFF', // White surface
    text: '#1E293B', // Dark slate for text
    textSecondary: '#64748B', // Muted text
    card: '#FFFFFF', // White cards
    border: '#E2E8F0', // Light border
    shadow: '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)',
    hover: '#F1F5F9', // Light hover state
    buttonText: '#FFFFFF', // White text on buttons
    inputBackground: '#F8FAFC', // Light input background
    inputBorder: '#CBD5E1', // Input border
    inputFocus: '#2563EB', // Input focus color
    tableHeader: '#F1F5F9', // Table header background
    tableRow: '#FFFFFF', // Table row background
    tableRowHover: '#F8FAFC', // Table row hover
    divider: '#E2E8F0' // Divider color
  },
  dark: {
    primary: '#3B82F6', // Brighter blue for dark mode
    secondary: '#38BDF8', // Bright sky blue
    accent: '#A78BFA', // Lighter purple
    success: '#10B981', // Bright green
    warning: '#F59E0B', // Bright orange
    error: '#EF4444', // Bright red
    background: '#0F172A', // Dark blue-gray background
    surface: '#1E293B', // Dark surface
    text: '#F8FAFC', // Light text
    textSecondary: '#94A3B8', // Muted light text
    card: '#1E293B', // Dark cards
    border: '#334155', // Dark border
    shadow: '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
    hover: '#334155', // Dark hover state
    buttonText: '#FFFFFF', // White text on buttons
    inputBackground: '#1E293B', // Dark input background
    inputBorder: '#475569', // Dark input border
    inputFocus: '#3B82F6', // Input focus color
    tableHeader: '#1E293B', // Dark table header
    tableRow: '#0F172A', // Dark table row
    tableRowHover: '#334155', // Dark table row hover
    divider: '#334155' // Dark divider
  }
};
